name: 1. Generate Custom Text Content with IBM Granite 3.3 8B Instruct AI

parameters.content:
## ‚úÖ **üîµ SECTION 1: Trigger & Setup**

### ‚öôÔ∏è **Nodes**

1Ô∏è‚É£ **On clicking 'execute'**

* **What it does:** Starts the workflow manually when you hit *Execute*.
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** Perfect for testing text generation on-demand.

2Ô∏è‚É£ **Set API Key**

* **What it does:** Stores your **Replicate API key** securely.
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** You don‚Äôt hardcode credentials into HTTP nodes ‚Äî just set them once here.
* **Beginner tip:** Replace `YOUR_REPLICATE_API_KEY` with your actual API key.

---

### üí° **Beginner Benefit**

‚úÖ No coding needed to handle authentication.
‚úÖ You can reuse the same setup for other Replicate models.

## ‚úÖ **ü§ñ SECTION 2: Model Request & Polling**

### ‚öôÔ∏è **Nodes**

3Ô∏è‚É£ **Create Prediction (HTTP Request)**

* **What it does:** Sends a **POST request** to Replicate‚Äôs API to start a text generation job.
* **Parameters include:** `temperature`, `max_tokens`, `top_k`, `top_p`.
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** Controls how creative or focused the AI text output will be.

4Ô∏è‚É£ **Extract Prediction ID (Code)**

* **What it does:** Pulls the **prediction ID** and builds a URL for checking status.
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** Replicate jobs run asynchronously, so you need the ID to track progress.

5Ô∏è‚É£ **Wait**

* **What it does:** Pauses for **2 seconds** before checking the prediction again.
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** Prevents spamming the API with too many requests.

6Ô∏è‚É£ **Check Prediction Status (HTTP Request)**

* **What it does:** Polls the Replicate API for the **current status** (e.g., `starting`, `processing`, `succeeded`).
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** Lets you loop until the AI finishes generating text.

7Ô∏è‚É£ **Check If Complete (IF Condition)**

* **What it does:** If the status is **succeeded**, it goes to ‚ÄúProcess Result.‚Äù Otherwise, it loops back to **Wait** and retries.
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** Creates an automated polling loop without writing complex code.

---

### üí° **Beginner Benefit**

‚úÖ No need to manually refresh or check job status.
‚úÖ Workflow keeps retrying until text is ready.
‚úÖ Smart looping built-in with *Wait + If Condition*.

---

## ‚úÖ **üü¢ SECTION 3: Process & Output**

### ‚öôÔ∏è **Nodes**

8Ô∏è‚É£ **Process Result (Code)**

* **What it does:** Collects the final **AI output**, status, metrics, and timestamps.
* **Adds info like:**

  * ‚úÖ `output` ‚Üí Generated text
  * ‚úÖ `model` ‚Üí `ibm-granite/granite-3.3-8b-instruct`
  * ‚úÖ `metrics` ‚Üí Performance data
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** Gives you a neat, structured JSON result that‚Äôs easy to send to Sheets, Notion, or any app.

---

# Generate Custom Text Content with IBM Granite 3.3 8B Instruct AI

This workflow connects to **Replicate‚Äôs API** and uses the **ibm-granite/granite-3.3-8b-instruct** model to generate text.

---

## ‚úÖ **üîµ SECTION 1: Trigger & Setup**

### ‚öôÔ∏è **Nodes**

1Ô∏è‚É£ **On clicking 'execute'**

* **What it does:** Starts the workflow manually when you hit *Execute*.
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** Perfect for testing text generation on-demand.

2Ô∏è‚É£ **Set API Key**

* **What it does:** Stores your **Replicate API key** securely.
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** You don‚Äôt hardcode credentials into HTTP nodes ‚Äî just set them once here.
* **Beginner tip:** Replace `YOUR_REPLICATE_API_KEY` with your actual API key.

---

### üí° **Beginner Benefit**

‚úÖ No coding needed to handle authentication.
‚úÖ You can reuse the same setup for other Replicate models.

---

## ‚úÖ **ü§ñ SECTION 2: Model Request & Polling**

### ‚öôÔ∏è **Nodes**

3Ô∏è‚É£ **Create Prediction (HTTP Request)**

* **What it does:** Sends a **POST request** to Replicate‚Äôs API to start a text generation job.
* **Parameters include:** `temperature`, `max_tokens`, `top_k`, `top_p`.
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** Controls how creative or focused the AI text output will be.

4Ô∏è‚É£ **Extract Prediction ID (Code)**

* **What it does:** Pulls the **prediction ID** and builds a URL for checking status.
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** Replicate jobs run asynchronously, so you need the ID to track progress.

5Ô∏è‚É£ **Wait**

* **What it does:** Pauses for **2 seconds** before checking the prediction again.
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** Prevents spamming the API with too many requests.

6Ô∏è‚É£ **Check Prediction Status (HTTP Request)**

* **What it does:** Polls the Replicate API for the **current status** (e.g., `starting`, `processing`, `succeeded`).
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** Lets you loop until the AI finishes generating text.

7Ô∏è‚É£ **Check If Complete (IF Condition)**

* **What it does:** If the status is **succeeded**, it goes to ‚ÄúProcess Result.‚Äù Otherwise, it loops back to **Wait** and retries.
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** Creates an automated polling loop without writing complex code.

---

### üí° **Beginner Benefit**

‚úÖ No need to manually refresh or check job status.
‚úÖ Workflow keeps retrying until text is ready.
‚úÖ Smart looping built-in with *Wait + If Condition*.

---

## ‚úÖ **üü¢ SECTION 3: Process & Output**

### ‚öôÔ∏è **Nodes**

8Ô∏è‚É£ **Process Result (Code)**

* **What it does:** Collects the final **AI output**, status, metrics, and timestamps.
* **Adds info like:**

  * ‚úÖ `output` ‚Üí Generated text
  * ‚úÖ `model` ‚Üí `ibm-granite/granite-3.3-8b-instruct`
  * ‚úÖ `metrics` ‚Üí Performance data
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** Gives you a neat, structured JSON result that‚Äôs easy to send to Sheets, Notion, or any app.

---

### üí° **Beginner Benefit**

‚úÖ Ready-to-use text output.
‚úÖ Easy integration with any database or CRM.
‚úÖ Transparent metrics (when it started, when it finished, etc.).

---

## ‚úÖ‚úÖ‚úÖ **‚ú® FULL FLOW OVERVIEW**

| Section                        | What happens                                                                 |
| ------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| ‚ö° **Trigger & Setup**          | Start workflow + set Replicate API key.                                      |
| ü§ñ **Model Request & Polling** | Send request ‚Üí get Prediction ID ‚Üí loop until job completes.                 |
| üü¢ **Process & Output**        | Extract clean AI-generated text + metadata for storage or further workflows. |

---

## üìå **How You Benefit Overall**

‚úÖ No coding needed ‚Äî just configure your API key.
‚úÖ Reliable polling ‚Äî the workflow waits until results are ready.
‚úÖ Flexible ‚Äî you can extend output to Google Sheets, Slack, Notion, or email.
‚úÖ Beginner-friendly ‚Äî clean separation of input, process, and output.

---

‚ú® With this workflow, you‚Äôve turned **Replicate‚Äôs IBM Granite LLM** into a no-code text generator ‚Äî running entirely inside **n8n**! ‚ú®

---
